author: Lesley Waters
method: For the sauce, place all the ingredients into a bowl and mix together well. To serve, place the coriander in a small bowl, add the langoustines, spoon over the sauce and garnish with the lemon wedges.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz Greek yoghurt,  2 tbsp double cream,  2 tbsp tomato ketchup,  ½ tsp Worcestershire sauce,  ½ tsp Tabasco sauce,  1 tbsp chopped fresh coriander,  ½ lemon, juice only,  salt and freshly ground black pepper ,  handful fresh coriander,  4 langoustines, cooked and peeled,  2 lemon wedges
